name: Hobo with a Blastgun
description:
Red robots gone crazy!
Shoot those bloody tinheads with your laser!
Shoot them!
Shoot them ALL!

Amazing Features:
★★★ Thrilling Challenge ★★★
Survive as long as you can in this hardcore action game!

★★★ Amazing graphics ★★★
Enjoy stunning animations and visual effects! 6 animated backgrounds to play on!

★★★ Exciting soundtrack ★★★
Listen to the most thrilling music while shooting up robots!

★★★ Competitive play ★★★
The game uses Google Play Games Leaderboard so you can compare scores with your friends!

★★★ FREE ★★★
The game is completely free!

Please leave all your suggestions below. We would really appreciate your feedback!
